messages.content: Super dumb that people are downvoting you for asking a question in good faith.
You're not really pissing anyone off. Mostly we just pity you.
The thing to understand about [NAME] is that he's a complete moron.
[NAME], learn some fucking grammar and punctuation. Maybe use some paragraphs. Just an idea.
You really don't comprehend anything my man, now do you? Goodness gracious the amount of stupidity.
I'm just gonna take this as a metaphor for idiot units.
how blurry this photo is r/mildlyinfuriating
RNG-based access to very important mechanics is frustrating for some people.
Well that sucks. But still if you refuses the test you'd probably have been charged, which is worse.
"one of us will be right!" Or...ya both wrong and wasted your energy being dumb asses instead of enjoying it.
That's a very long way of saying "I'm a moron"
I think it's normal. Don't analyse how you look like and worry about it btw, those idiots sure don't when they say their bullshit
If this is serious mate it’s not the kind of shit you should be posting on reddit
Saying that combo with a straight face after the fucking mess that went into the last UFC event should be hard.
Alright now you're intentionally misinterpreting what I say. Whatever.
Watching [NAME] flip his head back every poke of contact is possibly the most frustrating thing to watch
0.1% is a 1 in a thousand chance there, dumbass.
Such bullshit. Reloading components included? Not that they'd let that stand in subsequent laws if it is.
For the people and finding out how they end up? Sure. Other than that, it’s not great. Frustrating at best.
That's the problem I'm pointing, the media use stupid clicbait names and people get dumber and dumber.
Yeah that's what I just got. Fkin annoying.
Organs are literal superfoods and it weirds me out there hasn't been some fad diet with them yet.
yeah I figured, that's actually incredibly annoying. that only flies because they don't care about bf4 anymore? time to start favoriting servers I guess
So get a job and leave. It's just going to get worse. First the tv then you. Get out while you can
